Summary: Was practicing my zoom on my camera on the moon when I noticed several bright orb like objects by the moon.
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Chandler
There were no other sightings in Chandler on or around July 14th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailson 7\14\2009 at around 1:30, i was looking at the moon with my video camera. i wa practicing my zoom skills on my camera(it has a 2000x zoom). as i was looking at the lcd panel i noticed 3 bright orbs in a line directly to the right of the moon. the top being the brightest. the 3 orbs changed color and brightness. the lower 2 actually disappearing individually and reappearing. i started to film them. i filmed for about 2 min. i stopped recording to try to adjust the tripod but when i went to refocus in i couldn't get it to focus clearly(some cloud cover). i was very excited to see and capture these orb. at first, i wasn't sure i was really seeing it. my son came out and witnessed what i was filming and was equally excited. after i uploaded the video and had a chance to really look at it further, i notices that there is something else moving on the moon area towards the top right by a crater. you can view it at http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=qen_c6ayskm or youtube marlorinaz1 "amazing footage ufo's by moon"
